channel.title: ::tellmod ::telladmin?
channel.description: I was wondering if someone could put together a code for me or if some has a code that is like ::tellmod and it would send a message to all the online mods and they could respond to it. and only the mods can see it. Is that even possible? Anything like that would be appreciated. Or even a tut. Thanks.

item.title: ::tellmod ::telladmin?
item.dc:creator: @kriskuhar kriskuhar
item.description:
@kriskuhar wrote:

I found it but i get this error…

client.java:9946: cannot find symbol symbol : method modYell(java.lang.String) location: class client modYell("[MOD] " + playerName + ": "

obviously it doesnt recon the ModYell, but what would i change it too?

the whole code is this…

if (command.startsWith("mod") && (command.length() > 4)) { String text = command.substring(4); modYell("[MOD] " + playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Read full topic

item.title: ::tellmod ::telladmin?
item.dc:creator: @mod_cody mod cody
item.description:
@mod_cody wrote:

Search for a Dodian server source and go into client class and search “mod”
That should be about it just put the username inside of the command.
If you need anymore help pm me or msn me

Read full topic
